title: Most Menu Actions Should Be Disabled for Customers from Repository
description: In Bug 18016, most menu actions should be disabled for customers from the repository, but the rest is meaningless and they should be removed.
OB: Most menu actions are not disabled for customers from the repository.
EB: Menu actions for customers from the repository should be disabled, except for necessary ones.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the repository view.
2. Open a .java file.
